content: mandala placemats yarn yarn used in this pattern is 100% combed cotton 340 m/100 g crochet hook 2 5 mm abbreviations used single_crochet single_crochet sl slip_stitch chain chain stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet treble_crochet treble/tripple crochet only in alternative 2 of row 22 chr chain or sequence of chains in previous row sl… - slip_stitch to nearest chain or sequence of chains in previous row dc2 2 double_crochet together in previous row repeat * * - repeat instructions between * s until end of row pattern in written instructions first double_crochet in every row is replaced by 3 chain stitches first half_double_crochet in a row is replaced by 2 chain stitches every row ends with a slip_stitch in first stitch of the row 1 start with a magic loop 2 12 double_crochet in magic loop 3 2 double_crochet and 1 chain in every stitch 4 sl… 3 double_crochet and 1 chain in each chr 5 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet and 2 double_crochet in each chr -> a total of 60 double_crochet 6 *2 double_crochet in double_crochet 1 chain skip next double_crochet* repeat*-* 7 sl… 1 double_crochet 1 chain and 1 double_crochet in each chr 8 sl 3 double_crochet in each chr 9 slip_stitch to next gap between 2 groups of 3 double_crochet s in previous row 1 double_crochet and 3 chain in each gap between groups of 3 double_crochet s in previous row 10 sl… 3 double_crochet and 1 chain in each chr 11 sl 1 double_crochet 2 chain and 1 double_crochet in each chr 12 sl 2 double_crochet 2 chain and 2 double_crochet in each chr 13 sl… *1 single_crochet in chr skip 2 double_crochet 5 double_crochet in gap between two pairs of double_crochet s in previous row skip 2 double_crochet* repeat *-* 14 1 double_crochet 3 chain and 1 double_crochet in each single_crochet in previous row 15 sl… 4 double_crochet and 2 chain in each chr 16 sl… 3 double_crochet 2 chain and 3 double_crochet in each chr 17 sl… *1 single_crochet in chr 3 chain skip 3 double_crochet 1 double_crochet between two groups of 3 double_crochet in previous row 3 chain skip 3 double_crochet* repeat *-* 18 sl… 3 double_crochet and 1 chain in each chr 19 sl… 1 double_crochet and 3 chain in each chr 20 sl… 3 double_crochet and 2 chain in each chr 21 sl… sl… *3 double_crochet together 3 chain and 3 double_crochet together in chr 2 chain 1 single_crochet 3 chain 1 single_crochet and 2 chain in next chr* repeat *-* alternative 1 a little bit bigger 22 sl… *2 double_crochet together 2 chain 2 double_crochet together 2 chain 2 double_crochet together 2 chain and 2 double_crochet together in chr 2 chain 1 single_crochet in next chr 2 chain* repeat *-* 23 *1 double_crochet in dc2 1 chain 1 double_crochet in chr 1 chain 1 double_crochet in dc2 1 chain 1 double_crochet 2 chain 1 double_crochet and 1 chain in next chr 1 double_crochet in dc2 1 chain 1 double_crochet
